meaning: Indicates a unique identifier for a record.
Represents the name of an entity.
Indicates a date value (e.g., created_date, updated_date).
Stores a numerical count related to the entity.
A boolean (true/false) field indicating status or condition.
Represents the current status of a record (e.g., active, pending).
Used for standardized codes (e.g., country_code, error_code).
Defines the type/category of the entity.
Stores numerical or textual values related to the entity.
